name: Internetlandia - Football - Alpha 01
description:
This game was developed in 2020 as i was learning Godot Engine. Than I decided to remake it and I will be working on that and  it is going to be awesome one day.
Right now this is just a draft, but hey, it's alive and it plays on it's own!

So shall we try it?

one more thing: after 3min the game have an 1min intermission than change sides. it ends at 7min.
Commands:

Right Click on player foot to select Player 1
Left Click on Player foot  to select Player 2

Player 1
P1 Chute (kick) > Enter or Ctrl
P1 Dominio da bola (pull ball) > shift
P1 movimento (move)>
Player 2
P2 Chute (kick) > G
P2 Dominio (pull ball) > F
P2 Movimento (move) > W-A-S-D

All of this was developed with free softwares:
Linux Mint, Inkscape, Godot, Gimp, emoojitwo (pack de emoojis),
e audiosde  também livres.

Diego Ferrari Bruno 12/20
